title: Dungeon Creatures - Audio Pack
description: Audio for all the creatures at your dungeon! :D
longDescription:
Hello!


This is the pack for creatures in the dungeon, like skeletons, goblins, ogres, trolls, bats, snakes, spiders, ghosts, even mushrooms! And more! Take a look at the list:


  1. Bat_Attack_v1
  2. Bat_Attack_v2
  3. Big_Skeleton_v1
  4. Fish_Attack_v1
  5. Ghost_Attack_v1
  6. Goblin_Attack_v1
  7. Golem_Attack_v1
  8. Golem_Attack_v2
  9. Insect_Attack_v1
  10. Insect_Attack_v2
  11. Mouse_Attack_v1
  12. Mushroom_Poisoning_Attack_v1
  13. Ogre_Attack_v1
  14. Ogre_Attack_v2
  15. Shadow_Attack_v1
  16. Shadow_Attack_v2
  17. Skeleton_Attack_v1
  18. Slime_Attack_v1
  19. Snake_Attack_v1
  20. Spider_Attack_v1
  21. Toad_Attack_v1
  22. Toad_Attack_v2
  23. Troll_Attack_v1
  24. Undead_Attack_v1
  25. Undead_Attack_v2
  26. Worm_Attack_v1
  27. Worm_Attack_v2
  28. Bat_Flying_v1
  29. Ghost_Moving_v1
  30. Gobling_Walking_v1
  31. Insect_Flying_v1
  32. Skeleton_Walk_v1
  33. Worm_Crawling_v1


All files contain at least 3 variations! And you're getting it for free :D


Check the preview

Check the documentation


License:

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim as your own work.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 100+

Number of Audio Cues: 100+

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The image is free distributed for commercial use by pixabay, and the font is called "Ghoulish" also distributed for free for commercial use by 1001 fonts.
